social-listening.summary: Create social listening searches, fetch and analyze posts across X, Reddit, YouTube, LinkedIn, Podcasts. Monitor keywords, competitors, or your brand across any supported platform.

competitive-intel.summary: Monitor competitors across social platforms. Track product launches, positioning shifts, content strategy, and market movements. Generate competitive intelligence reports and battle cards.

email-responser.summary: Craft contextual email responses powered by social intelligence data. Draft replies informed by brand voice, sentiment signals, and audience context.
